description:
The Deviator Wind Pants are perfect for pushing the tempo during cool-weather activities. The hybrid mapped construction features windproof fabric at the front of the pant and ankle and a water-resistant coating that protects against the elements, while the baritone knit fabric at the waist and back of the leg provides stretch and breathability. The ActiveTemp™ treatment regulates body temperature to keep you comfortable, and the articulated knees allow a full range of motion.

Zippered ankle cuff closures, reflective logos, and UPF 30 sun protection add to the feature list, while the drop-in right thigh and left thigh zip pockets provide plenty of storage for your essentials. Designed to be paired with the Deviator Hoodie, the Deviator Wind Pants are a cool-weather specialist for active use.
name: Outdoor Research Deviator Wind Pants - Mens
